subject: Olympic Games
Track and Field
Photography
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: Before digital everything, history moved in tenths of a second. Steven Sutton photographed the 1972 U.S. Olympic track and field trials in Eugene, Ore., also the site of this year’s trials.
snippet: Before digital everything, history moved in tenths of a second. Steven Sutton photographed the 1972 U.S. Olympic track and field trials in Eugene, Ore., also the site of this year’s trials.
